name: Nice World 2
description:
Adventure through the [s4s] universe as Beary Nice and Co. in the long-awaited ebin sequel to Nice World! Memes have gone haywire and [s4s] is facing destruction. Remind them all that life is happy and nice by taking on eleven stages and three epic boss fights. You too can save the timeline!

You must download both the executable and saudio.dll and put them in the same folder to play!

Alternate Download (Mega.NZ)

Tips and tricks:

  • ESC closes the game and you will lose all of your progress! There are no pause or save functions.
  • You can charge up a roll to scale taller platforms by holding down, rapidly pressing A, then releasing and pressing right.
  • Game Over screens are not the end of the world; you will always replenish three lives upon selecting "Yes" to continue!
  • Journalist skip options for two harder stages do exist (HE stage, S-Force Act 3) and can be utilized by pressing N when the option appears at the beginning of those stages.
  • There is more than one route on some of the stages to explore. Look out for references or cameos as you progress!
  • You can find nearly every track for the game over at the esfores bandcamp page!
